title: Trump Takes on Sessions in Early Morning Tweets (Audio)
itunes:title: Trump Takes on Sessions in Early Morning Tweets (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Stephen Vladeck, a professor at the University of Texas Law School, discusses the attorney General Jeff Sessions's job security, as President Trump criticizes the nation's top law enforcement official on Twitter. He speaks with Greg Stohr and June Grasso on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
